api_list.name: Get specific Hotel by Slug
api_list.description: Use slug to get the specific Hotel
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hotel-collection.p.rapidapi.com/hotels/{slug}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hotel-collection.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all the Hotels
api_list.description: This endpoint return the collection of Hotels available
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hotel-collection.p.rapidapi.com/hotels"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hotel-collection.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
